entry.title: Klear Kote PLUS UV Epoxy Resin 2 gal kit NEW
entry.summary:
Vendor: CreativeWholesale
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 111.00

Klear Kote PLUS, with UV Inhibitor   KKPLUS

NEW PRODUCT  2 Gallons Kit

High Gloss Epoxy Coating

Two Gallon Kit, (Contains 1 Gallon Resin, 1 Gallon Hardener.) 
Klear Kote PLUS Epoxy Coating is an clear, high gloss finishing epoxy.  Klear Kote PLUS has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure.  Ideal as a table top epoxy, bar top epoxy, art epoxy, and for home improvements, craft projects, and many other finishes. 

Klear Kote Application Instructions

SDS for Klear Kote PLUS Hardener

SDS for Klear Kote Resin

 

ORM-D, Consumer Commodity product.  GROUND SHIPMENTS ONLY.   See Terms and Conditions.

entry.title: BernzOmatic Hose & Trigger Start Torch Kit BZ8250HT
entry.summary:
Vendor: CreativeWholesale
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 69.95

BernzOmatic Trigger Start Hose Torch Kit # BZ8250HT, with 5 foot hose & belt holder for propane canister.  Great torch for removing bubbles from Epoxy Coatings.  Has swirl flame, stainless steel burn tube, adjustable flame control button, lock Button, instant on/off trigger igniter.

Propane Canister Not Included.

entry.title: Bernzomatic Self Igniting Torch WT2301
entry.summary:
Vendor: CreativeWholesale
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 19.99

BernzOmatic Self Igniting Torch  # WT2301 with adjustable Flame control

Great torch for removing bubbles form epoxy coatings

Combine with WH0159 hose attachment to make your own torch hose kit

Propane Tank Not included

entry.title: BernzOmatic Universal Torch Extension Hose 5' #WH0159
entry.summary:
Vendor: Worthington
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 23.97

BernzOmatic Universal Torch Extension Hose 5'

Add this hose to your present Propane Torch and tanks to assist in large projects.

Perfect for removing bubbles on large Epoxy coating applications.

Make your own torch and hose kit.  See torches WT2301 and UL2317

Propane Canister Not Included.

entry.title: Epoxy Spreader TRL1
entry.summary:
Vendor: CreativeWholesale
Type: Plastic Trowel
Price: 0.99

Epoxy-Spreader   

Spreader is 4"x4",  with 1/4", 1/8", 1/16" notches and a flat side for thin or skim coats

Use this trowel to spread Epoxy Coatings over your project
